textos.texto: -This is an early access of NYMUS. This demo contains images and videos that may be harmful to people with photosensitive epilepsy.
-The game starts now.
-Is it really like this?
-That's right. We're almost there.
-Usually, this is not how you remove a virus from a computer, but we'll go back to the archaic method.
-We will remove it manually. Literally.
-I'm feeling kind of weird. So this is what it's like to enter a computer?
-Exactly. And we are going straight to our goal: the games folder.
-We'll have to check which game is having the problem first. And then we'll see how to remove the virus.
-I shouldn't have downloaded the game from that suspicious site. Everyone at the job was playing it and I just wanted to be part of that too...
-It happens. But there are consequences. It seems that some other games started to have problems too, so we need to investigate.
-But don't worry about it. I'll be watching you from here and I'll be helping you.
-Perhaps it will not be that hard, will it?
-Let's go. I'm ready.
-WOW! Are we inside the computer for real!?
-You never did it?
-Since you never entered a computer before, it can feel a bit weird but it's quite easy, you just need to press 'A' or '←' to go to the left and 'D' or '→' to go to the right.
-It's weird to be in a 2D world...
-You can jump with 'W', 'Space' and '↑' if you need. Now let's focus, we still need to find the virus!
-I think we need to enter this tiny door to continue, but how?
-We are only pixels, everything is possible! Try pressing 'E'.
-Oh my..
-Be careful with these pits.. I can see danger from here!
-A box..
-Push it down there pressing 'E'. I think it will help
-I will try..
-I think we are done here, everything looks peacefull
-Let's keep looking for the virus, if we take too long it will only be worse. QUICK!!
-WHAT HAPPENED!
-It looks like we are in another game...
-The last one wasn't infected, let's see if this one is infected.
-Remember, every weird thing can be a relevant clue.
-That's a SLIME?
-In this game they are EXTREMELY DANGEROUS!
-What they do?
-they will attack you. Take care of them before going.
-Or you can try dodging and keep exploring... whatever you like.
-Press 'F' to attack
-Is anyone playing something? What is this music?
-It looks like a guitar.
-I think I can see someone playing it up there!
-What a beautifull song.. Who are you?
-Good afternoon! What brings a little robot to this place?
-I'm just passing by, looking for something wrong or out of place...
-There's a lot of wrong things here these days. It's nice to see someone new, my name is Jorel.
-Right now everything is really peacefull or at least it should be.
-Some friends of mine told me that The Corruption is expanding more and more each day.
-The Corruption?
-That's right. It seems like everything is desintegrating piece by piece. I don't recommend that you go to the other side of the island.
-But if The Corruption is growing, it's going to get here too.
-I know. That's why I'm enjoying my last moment's doing what I like the most...
-Look, I can help. The Corruption is in the other side of the island, right? I can go there!
-You wanna go ther? How courageus.
-It already passed two or three with the same intentions, do you believe it?
-Are they okay?
-They never came back.
-The path to The Corruption is really long and it has a lot a dangerous things.
-The big cave is a place no one who lives here go to. Almost no one from there can come here and no one from here can cross there.
-Anyway, if that's you intention keep this key, it will help you start your journey.
-Thanks Jorel!! Don't worry about me, I will be fine.
-A lever.
-You will need a key to unlock it.
-When you get a key press 'E' to unlock it.
-Another lever..
-Oh, it looks like the last key you used won't work here. I think you need to use another one.
-What about that cave there?
-Probably the key is there and the way to the other side too.
-Uhh. It's cold here.
-No time for idle chat, LOOK, THERE'S A BAT HERE!
-This lever looks like the same one we saw back at the entrance of the cave. It needs a special key.
-Arrows?
-Well, that guy up there said it would be dangerous.
-Lifes!! Cool!
-Finally I got out of this cave.
-You did well in this elevator!
-Thanks NYMUS!
-I don't know about you, but I'm feeling like things are getting a little weird around here.
-That's.. Glitchs?
-My God. What's happening here?
-Looks like the Corruption are actually glitchs. They are our indicators that the virus is nearby!
-So this virus corrupts the computer files... It's hard to indentify it with only this. But we know one thing: we are getting close.
-It seems we are in the right place
-Corrupted files, data overload...
-This is a big one, Huh?
-I shouldn't have downloaded that game from a suspicious site.
-The only thing we can do now is remove it from the computer.
-Keep looking for clues.
-We are close. I can feel it.
-Another tiny door...
-Wasn't it from that other game?
-Yes. Just like the bats and slimes.
-Things are getting tangled here.
-Data overload and data fusion. Maybe it's a polymorphic, code injection virus?
-What that means?
-It means it's a virus that changes every time it's injected in a computer, but it's only a hypothesis.
-Down there the situation seems to be tense.
-Anyway, You will need to go there to take the next key.
-I will try!
-Everything collapsing!
-This way. I can see the way out right there. Let's go L3h!
-Run. For your computer, for Jorel and all the corrupted files.
-L3h, I think I know what's happening here.
-What do you mean NYMUS?
-It's just like I suspected... It's a VIRUT!!!!!
-Virut?
-Virut is a file virus that is applied from executables.
-Like i suspected, it's a polymorphic, code injection virus.
-Listen well. I can only say it once.
-Virut's are extremely dangerous, and it probably will attack you. Firstly, it invades your security system (Firewall).
-Then your Firewall indentify suspicious movement of malicious files.
-Why don't the Firewall blocks it from getting here?
-That's the problem. Virus of the Virut tipe are polymorphic and will change with time, bypassing firewalls. It probably will use it against you.
-Like I said, the Virut infects computer using code injection and here you are just like a computer, if he infects you, it can be your end.
-And lastly, the Virut overloads computers and it creates data explosions that can hurt you.
-It seems impossible. How can I deal with a threat like this?
-The Virut has a weakness: The network port.
-Network ports are points of communication data uses to get form a device to another device. The network ports are numbered form 0 to 65535 and they track and block suspicious movement.
-The Virut analises the ports and it invades a vulnerable one, injecting it's code in the computer.
-How do I use it against him?

-It's simple. You just need to indentify which network port is open and cut it's connection with the Virut. When you that I believe he will be weak and vulnerable. This is the only way to remove it from the computer without it comming back.
-I need to pay attention to the doors then? I will try to cut it's connetion. I can do it.
-I'm counting with you, L3h.
-Let's get rid of him once and for all!
Hey! You can get down from the platforms in the Virut's arena pressing 'S' or '↓'.
